Name: neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation 2a
Definition: A neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance of mutation in the PLA2G6 gene on chromosome 22q13.1 and is characterized by onset in the first 2 years of life.

Name: neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation 2b
Definition: A neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance of mutation in the PLA2G6 gene on chromosome 22q13.1.

Name: neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation 3
Definition: A neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation that has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant inheritance of mutation in the FTL gene on chromosome 19q13.33.

Name: neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation 4
Definition: A neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance of mutation in the C19orf12 gene on chromosome 19q12.
Synonym: Neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation type 4

Name: neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation 5
Definition: A neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation that has_material_basis_in X-linked dominant inheritance of mutation in the WDR45 gene on chromosome Xp11.23.
Synonym: Static Encephalopathy Of Childhood With Neurodegeneration In Adulthood

Name: neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation 6
Definition: A neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance of mutation in the COASY gene on chromosome 17q21.2.
Synonym: Neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation due to COASY mutation

Name: pantothenate kinase-associated neurodegeneration
Definition: A neurodegeneration with brain iron accumulation that has_material_basis_in autosomal recessive inheritance of mutation in the PANK2 gene on chromosome 20p13.
